sources.title: 1953 - Dangerous Crossing - Travesía peligrosa - Joseph M. Newman - VOSE
Dangerous Crossing (1953) Directed by Joseph M. Newman, Starring Jeanne Crain, Michael Rennie
sources.description: Dangerous Crossing is a 1953 black-and-white FILM NOlR mystery film, directed by Joseph M. Newman and starring Jeanne Crain and Michael Rennie, based on the 1943 play Cabin B-13 by John Dickson Carr. The plot of the film centers on the gaslighting of a female protagonist aboard a cruise vessel.   You can find out more about this movie from this Wikipedia article .

sources.title: Dangerous Crossing (1953)
sources.description: A young bride is set to begin her honeymoon aboard a luxury liner. Her happiness does not last when she finds that her husband has disappeared. Trouble is, no one else ever saw him board the ship with her and his name has mysteriously dropped from the passenger list. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/dangerous-crossing-1953/

metadata.Plot: A young bride is set to begin her honeymoon aboard a luxury liner. Her happiness does not last when she finds that her husband has disappeared. Trouble is, no one else ever saw him board the ship with her and his name has mysteriously dropped from the passenger list.
metadata.Actors: Jeanne Crain, Michael Rennie, Max Showalter
